item.title: Outofbounds compile helppppp
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I don’t know how this is done in 562, but if you’re adding these into a .cfg file, you need to use tabs instead of spaces, usually excluding the spaces in the words Item = 20771.

item.title: Outofbounds compile helppppp
item.dc:creator: @codyskate5021 codyskate5021
item.description:
@codyskate5021 wrote:

[quote=“modzilla, post:1, topic:417807”]Mkay im trying to add prices to some of my server items such as: Torva Pernix and Virtus i get this error

Here is my code

Item = 20135 60 5000 5000 Item = 20139 70 5000 5000 Item = 20143 70 5000 50000 Item = 20147 55 5000 50000 Item = 20151 65 5000 50000 Item = 20155 65 5000 50000 Item = 20159 50 5000 50000 Item = 20163 60 5000 50000 Item = 20167 60 5000 50000 Item = 21731 150 5000 50000 Item = 20763 500000 500000 500000000 Item = 20769 133700 133700 1337000000 Item = 20771 214700 214700 2147000000 Item = 19706 120000 120000 120000

I am getting that error because of these items including the 19706 dungeon Master cape

This is code for Some random items to prove the codes okay

Item = 15021 23000 23000 23000 Item = 15022 23000 23000 23000 Item = 15023 230000 230000 230000 Item = 15024 23000 23000 23000 Item = 15025 230000 230000 230000 Item = 15026 23000 23000 23000 Item = 15027 50000 50000 50000 Item = 15028 50000 50000 50000 Item = 15029 500000 500000 500000 Item = 15030 50000 50000 50000 Item = 15031 500000 500000 500000 Item = 15032 50000 50000 50000 Item = 15033 75000 75000 75000 Item = 15034 75000 75000 75000 Item = 15035 750000 750000 750000 Item = 15036 75000 75000 75000 Item = 15037 750000 750000 750000 Item = 15038 75000 75000 75000 Item = 15039 100000 100000 100000 Item = 15040 100000 100000 100000 Item = 15041 1000000 1000000 1000000 Item = 15042 100000 100000 100000 Item = 15043 1000000 1000000 1000000 Item = 15044 100000 100000 100000

I think that since the items are above a certain such as 19000+ thats why it has no clue what it is, i just dont know where to change that in the int to increase the range? help pweeease.

562 server rs2hd[/quote]

lol i can help you nice leeching renaming it wont help but ill help you

Read full topic
